Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Riverdell Way, west of Nicholas' Enchanted Weapons.
Room.LongDescription: Ironically, Nicholas has no enchanted weapons for sale, but likes to advertise that he does to get people to buy his less powerful but more common stock. The large shopping center to the east boasts a number of simple stores and services. The center continues around the block. On the west side of the street is a dark forest.
